message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to your business. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for a price that reflects its potential. Are you interested in discussing this further?
